name: Cassie Ventura's settlement with Sean Combs

attributes.description: Ventura confirmed that the amount of the settlement from her civil lawsuit against Combs was $20 million. When asked whether the settlement came at a time of financial hardship for her family, Ventura denied this was the case. Ventura said she would give the money back if she never had to participate in the 'freak-offs' with escorts.
